high_level_findings: Commit early return on unbound sets leaves commit_mutex locked, enabling persistent nftables control-plane DoS until reboot.
GC and abort/commit races across set/flowtable teardown can double-free offload resources or process stale elements, risking crashes and policy bypass.
Lack of serialization for pending updates and module autoload unlock creates windows where concurrent netlink operations corrupt transaction lists or bypass ownership.
